entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Guid.Parse issue #84194
  • PGO for Memmove unrolling #84192
    Future
  • JSON source generator crawling never picks up a property #84190
  • Outerloop StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops NonBacktracking test is deterministically timing out #84188
    8.0.0
  • 7.0 Native AOT linux-arm64 compiler references glibc 2.27 #84183
    7.0.x
  • Merged test groups - check behavior when a test with incorrect settings is added to a merged directory #84182
  • System.CommandLine: Completions #84179
  • System.CommandLine: Validation #84178
  • System.CommandLine: Parsing #84177
  • [6.0][windows][mono] HttpRequestException : Unknown error 0xffffffff 127.0.0.1:RandomPort #84175
  • [6.0][Android][mono] XHarness exit code 78 PACKAGE_INSTALLATION_FAILURE #84174
  • System.Linq.Expressions almost completely lacks support for ByRef values #84173
  • Blazor unhandled error bar appears when testing various mobile sizes from Chromium mobile simulators #84172
  • DEBUGGING IS NOT ENABLED for new Blazor WASM project in Chromium. #84171
  • trying to change Unix file access using Mono.Unix. Getting Unable to find an entry point named 'Mono_Posix_Syscall_stat' in DLL 'Mono.Unix #84166
  • BinClashes for Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration.dll #84157
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAot] Rare deadlock when two threads try to suspend runtime #83898
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Rare stress crash due to unwalkable transition frame capturing a hijacked return address. #83900
    8.0.0
  • The data annotation error message not in the same style #83642
    Future
  • Generalize Arm64 ldr/str to ldp/stp optimization #81278
    8.0.0
  • ARM64: Optimize pair of "str reg, [reg]" to stp #35133
    Future
  • [ARM64] Consecutive loads or stores not coalesced for vector operands #83773
    8.0.0
  • Implications of using EqualityComparer<TValue>.Default in ConcurrentDictionary #84163
  • Perfomance of For Loops is worse in Net7 to Net6 #76638
    8.0.0
  • Referencing `System.Text.Json` fails compilation with CS1705 (ERR_AssemblyMatchBadVersion) #84161
  • Multiple string concatenations in System.Net.Cookie class #84167
    Future
  • The current ManagedWebSocket.IsValidCloseStatus implementation may reject certain valid status codes when it shouldn't #82602
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Assertion failed 'node->IsUnusedValue() && "found an unmarked unused value"' - when compiling System.Net.Sockets.Tests #84112
    8.0.0
  • 💾 Bringing the size of Native AOT Hello World under 1.44 MB #83069
    Future
  • about net8 aot and arm11 support #84153
  • The frame times of my toy ray tracer increased from 24ms to 30ms #78127
    8.0.0
  • Parsing assembly qualified type name fails #84118
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable all in-process execution in JIT\Regression #84196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop excluding existing files from CORE_ROOT generation #84195
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Address timeouts in merged test groups #84193
    test-bug, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Mono library mode bundling #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Caching settings.pause_mode to avoid deadlock #84189
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Avoid blocking negative char sets in regex compiler / source gen #84187
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Set better DfsBlockEntry stack initial capacity #84186
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `LCL_VAR_ADDR` #84185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve IndexOfAnyValues throughput for needles with 0 #84184
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • add msquic to debug runtime on macOS #84181
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [Mono] Support get_Count and get_AllBitsSet for mini JIT on Arm64 #84180
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Simd refactoring #84170
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add switch: Do not resolve URLs by defaults for XML #84169
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Library mode enhancements. #84165
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • WIP: Refactor Interop.LocalAlloc follow-up #84164
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • WIP added explanation to more GC data structures #84162
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][metadata] Fix lookup of matching interface method with covariant returns #84160
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement proper parsing for primitives in config binding gen #84154
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Convert JIT\Regression tests to merged test groups #83895
    test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84099
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add additional close statuses in ManagedWebSocket #83827
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] JIT: fix bug in cloning conditions for jagged array (#83414) #83462
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.6
  • Delete unmanaged type name parser from CoreCLR #84159
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete two quirks for some CQ #84176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fixes for two rare stress issues. #83908
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize Convert.FromHexString #82521
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance
  • Use ldp/stp with SIMD registers on Arm64 #84135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update error thrown on multiple non-conforming StartupHook.Initialize signatures #84158
    area-Host
  • Take advantage of simplifications enabled by folding all indirect access to locals #79722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83966
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83965
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 6.0.17
  • Fix assert when SpanHelpers.SequenceEqual is unused #84155
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split `TryGetGenericMethodComponents` into two overloads #84156
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] ManagedToNativeGenerator: Skip unmanaged dlls #83957
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.6
  • Refactor `Interop.LocalAlloc` #82450
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Correction of three code comments in Dictionary.cs #84128
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix type parsing error returned for type names with invalid start of assembly name #84141
    area-System.Reflection

Updated

  • Build on CBL-mariner host with rootfs #84148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add status code and exception info to System.Net.Http events #84036
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use similar types for self-referential generics instead of the exact canonical type #83995
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2148535 #84102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Prepare ComInterfaceGenerator for going into the public API #83894
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] ARM64/X64 - Add `IsVNNeverNegative` #83694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change `callvirt` into `calli` for virtual delegates #83461
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Re-enable null check optimization for mid-method traces #84058
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Introduce a diagnostic switch to turn off the use of file mapping in PE loader. #84151
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Investigating timeout on debugger tests on CI #84080
    area-Debugger-mono
  • SHA3 #84132
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Reverting: Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility (#80581) #84028
    area-System.Reflection
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Optimize stackalloc zeroing via BLK #83255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_ADDR` #84147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Static cctor analysis for reflection #84089
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Preserve OCE.CancellationToken in ReadAtLeastAsync of StreamPipeReader #83926
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • JIT: Properly allocate shadow space for block op helpers on win-x64 #84124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Optimization on LinearScan::buildPhysRegRecords #83862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable more general BITCAST folding in local morph #84144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix BeginReceiveMessageFromV4BoundToSpecificV6_NotReceived #83463
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Use timeouts in 2 socket test cases #84030
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • toolchain.cmake: properly set toolchain for crossbuilding on Alpine Linux #83464
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` change case #84019
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Handle some "field offset computation" patterns #81998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Use dn_vector_t instead of GArray in a few places #84027
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #84082
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (3/3) IL Lowering & Outputting #83716
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Always create loop pre headers #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Add support for new output path format #31454
    untriaged
  • Add breaking change notification to the bot #31413
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • corrected package version for `Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers` #31566
    Area-Containers
  • syncing the logic in `CreateNewImage` and `ContainerBuilder` #31542
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • containers: updated 7.0.3xx release notes #31543
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

    Area-Infrastructure

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Diagnostic improvement: "argument used out of position and followed by unnamed argument" #67605
  • Roslyn performance tests should not use direct IVT #67604
  • VS Pro 2022 (64-bit) v17.5.3 - Feature 'Symbol Search' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #67598
  • IDE0055 should be better actionable #67594
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67592
  • CSC.RSP reference lines produce error #67590

Closed

  • GetImportScopes returns 0 scope at leading trivia attached to EOF #67447
    17.7
  • release/dev17.6 builds are failing an assert in Bootstrap build #67495
  • Update net7.0 TFM references to net8.0 #66930
    C# 12.0
  • CS8602 false positive #67062
    17.7
  • [nullable check]'from clause' should have nullable check in query expression #67370

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2148533 #67607
  • Use OneOrMany in the node->BoundNode map #67606
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid having to reread files from secondary storage just to get their version information #67603
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce the number of Location objects created during binding #67601
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow function breakpoints before module symbols are loaded #67600
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Revert for #67392 ([Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP) #67599
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, 17.6 P7
  • Incremental Generators documentation fixes #67593
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [Lightbulb Perf] AnalyzerDriver performance improvements #67591
    Area-Analyzers, Tenet-Performance, untriaged
  • Adjust comment for CompilerAnalyzerThrows in resx file #67589
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Switch semantic model to use `OneOrMany` instead of ImmutableArray for hot paths that often return a single value. #67587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67561
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67602
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix for livelock in DiagnosticComputer #67597
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Rename the inline hints option to match lsp names #67596
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify checksum hashing code. #67586
    Next
  • Add EE projects with IVT from compiler to Compilers.slnf #67583
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Avoid double lookup in dictionary #67588
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add archived feeds #67430
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove unnecessary temporary collection #67585
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid allocating enumerators in symbol usage analysis #67582
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations when producing checksums. #67584
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid allocations in 'add import' fixers #67574
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67609
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enc analysis fixes #67608
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE
  • [17.6] Check count before reusing cached items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Handle assignments in patterns #67517
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Analyzer load failure suppress #58376
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Update LSP package and avoid send workspace/configuration request to client if client doesn't have the ability #67560
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add razor compiler EA assembly to VSIX #67501
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Record added node output states as new #66725
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - Source Generators

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Annotate top-level methods that aren't native AOT friendly as such so that analyzers produce warnings at design time #47521
  • Windows Authentication For Kestrel: The name NegotiateDefaults does not exists in the current context. #47520
  • 503 error with InProcess hosting, completely fine with OutOfProcess hosting #47518
  • support multiple JSON serialization settings with Newtonsoft.Json in ASP.NET Core #47516

Closed

  • Method 'get_ServerSideSessions' in type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer.ApiAuthorizationDbContext`1' from assembly 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.ApiAuthorization.IdentityServer, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=adb9793829ddae60' does not have an implementation. #44990
    Discussions
  • JsonSubkeyClaimAction arrays #46864
    8.0-preview3
  • Moldinium: Dependency Tracking for Blazor #46302
    Discussions
  • Allow customizing the `class` attribute for the `ValidationMessage` component #47508
  • IMiddleware cannot be registered in dotnet 6 #47512
  • Grpc transcoding in .net 7 - cannot post repeated field #47510
  • ContentRangeHeaderValue "to" must always be less than "length" #44166
    8.0-preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Support zlib or raw deflate compression with 'deflate' content-coding #47522
    area-runtime
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix request body OpenAPI #47513
    area-grpc

Merged

  • JsonSubKeyClaim arrays #46878
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `e4156bd` to `fed4822` #47515
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a0ced33` to `b5fd99b` #47514
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Initial streaming SSR mechanisms #47484
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-united, 8.0-preview4
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix body binding to repeated message or map #47511
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview4
  • Treat 'Content-Range's with last-byte-pos equal to length as invalid #47489
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Replace SpanHelper.ReplacePlusWithSpace #47506
    area-runtime
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime
  • change 'ValuesController' to 'ValueController' #47474
    area-mvc, pr: pending author input
  • Add metrics to hosting and Kestrel #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XamlParseException should include file info #14338
  • ScrollView Does Not Resize for New Elements #14326
  • Let WebView receive messages from the WebSite #14325
  • [Android] Entry control ClearButtonVisibility="WhileEditing" tap location incorrect when inside multiple nested Grids #14323
  • ScrollView Panning does not work properly #14322
  • [Android] Changes to Grid during SizeChanged are delayed, or not applied correctly #14318
  • Android crash when tapping button rendered outside of container #14317
  • App crashed when use SearchBar #14316

Closed

  • Label no longer wrapping / measuring correctly inside Grid when available size shrinks enough #14296
    Backlog
  • Can't use JS interop outside the context of a component in MAUI #5804
    8.0-preview4
  • Android Issue - MediaPicker #10385
    Backlog
  • IOS: Scrollview inside Refreshview #12132
    Backlog
  • .Net Maui Hybrid + Paypal, Smart payment button works very well on Android, but not on Iphone #14162
  • embed:// uri not working from c# code #14319
  • Resources type or namespace does not exist #13677
  • [iOS] Page Contents shift down when using Prompt with input field. #14041
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
  • Merge net8 to release/8.0.1xx-preview3 #14333
  • Merge main into net8.0 #14332
  • Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • Don't update the top tabs frame inside the safe area changed #14330
    area/shell 🐢
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `CollectionView` #14329
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Add top safe area when top tabs are present #14328
    area/shell 🐢
  • [IntegrationTests] Bump template creation timeout #14327
    area/templates 📄
  • [Android] Allow to override WebViewClient on Android WebView #14321
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Merged

  • Ensure that second-pass measures of Auto rows/columns are allowed to expand #14315
    area/layout 🔲, backport/suggested
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #14307
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14312
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview3] Update preview3 branch with latest fixes from net8 #14308
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Do not scroll for UIAlertControllers #14100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • Add some conditions so we could skip if we wanted #14310

Updated

  • [xamlc] fix `assembly=mscorlib` namespaces in `Release` mode #14301
    area/Xaml </>, backport/suggested
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132
  • Refactor keyboard focus code for .NET 8 #13824
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Make sure the update the frame of the RefreshView content #14302
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [net7.0] Windows apps do not need GUIDs (remove check) #13034
    area/single project ☝️, backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • Reenable tests for iOS, as this should work now #13686
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make Windows FrameRenderer border measure area on resize #14174
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `Button` #14280
    area/controls 🎮
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Removal of the AppAction icon extension on Android #14235
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
